snippet: With major highways still closed and local roads snarled with traffic, residents and officials continued to clear the snow as they tried to get life back to normal.
abstract: Residents and officials on Long Island are trying to get back to normal as snow continues to bedevil them, with major highways still closed and local streets snarled with traffic or simply buried.

byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Vivian Yee contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: With major highways still closed and local roads snarled with traffic, residents and officials continued to clear the snow as they tried to get life back to normal.

headline.seo: In Driveways and Streets, Long Island Struggles With Snow
headline.main: In Driveways and Streets, Long Island Struggles
headline.print_headline: In Driveways And Streets, Long Island Struggles
